statements: SELECT user_id, access_level, data_security, confidentiality_level FROM user_permissions;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT confidentiality_level, user_id, data_security FROM user_permissions WHERE data_security = TRUE;
SELECT access_level, user_id FROM user_permissions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE confidentiality_level = 'High' AND data_security = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE access_level > 5;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_permissions WHERE data_security = TRUE ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT user_id, confidentiality_level FROM user_permissions WHERE access_level < 3;
SELECT user_id, access_level, confidentiality_level FROM user_permissions WHERE data_security = FALSE LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE confidentiality_level LIKE 'high%' AND data_security = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT data_id, confidentiality_level FROM data_security WHERE confidentiality_level > 5
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_permissions ORDER BY access_level DESC
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_permissions WHERE access_level < 3
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT access_level, user_id FROM user_permissions WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_permissions JOIN data_security ON user_permissions.user_id = data_security.data_id;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_permissions WHERE access_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions LEFT JOIN data_security ON user_permissions.user_id = data_security.data_id;
SELECT * FROM permissions;
SELECT permission_name, permission_description FROM permissions;
SELECT permission_id, permission_name, permission_description FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 1;
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT permission_id, permission_name, permission_description FROM permissions WHERE permission_name LIKE 'Admin%';
SELECT MAX(role_id) AS max_role_id FROM roles;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles INNER JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC, role_id ASC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE access_level > 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email, access_level FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT permission_name, description FROM permissions WHERE permission_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE access_level > 1 ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, access_level FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE role_id = 3;
SELECT username, email, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE access_level > 3;
